label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_024
content:
## 2026-01-26 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /dns-query: REQUESTS req | p50: 12ms p95: 35ms p99: 50ms | err: 0.09% (22 errors) | success: 99.91%
- /zone-transfer: REQUESTS req | p50: 640ms p95: 1610ms p99: 2000ms | err: 3.5% (2 failures) | success: 96.5%
- /dns-sec-sign: REQUESTS req | p50: 25ms p95: 60ms p99: 80ms | err: 0.0% | success: 100%
- /health-check: REQUESTS req | p50: 10ms p95: 20ms p99: 30ms | err: 0.0% | success: 100%
- /cache-purge: REQUESTS req | p50: 15ms p95: 40ms p99: 55ms | err: 0.0% | success: 100%
- /config-update: REQUESTS req | p50: 18ms p95: 45ms p99: 60ms | err: 0.0% | success: 100%
- /dnssec-policy: REQUESTS req | p50: 22ms p95: 55ms p99: 70ms | err: 0.0% | success: 100%
- /ttl-change: REQUESTS req | p50: 30ms p95: 70ms p99: 90ms | err: 0.0% | success: 100%

### Infrastructure
- bind-master-01: CPU 41% | Mem 66% | Disk 80% | Conns: 1395 | Net: 105/148 Mbps
- bind-slave-02: CPU 30% | Mem 56% | Disk 59% | Conns: 1248 | Net: 82/100 Mbps
- cloud-dns-sync-01: CPU 66% | Mem 78% | Disk 56% | Conns: 0 | Net: 135/176 Mbps
- signer-01: CPU 49% | Mem 80% | Disk 66% | Conns: 0 | Net: 22/27 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- pool-axfr: active 12 | idle 3 | waiting 2 | exhaustion 0 | max 20 | avg_wait 15ms
- pool-ixfr: active 8 | idle 4 | waiting 1 | exhaustion 0 | max 15 | avg_wait 10ms
- pool-dnssec: active 5 | idle 2 | waiting 0 | exhaustion 0 | max 10 | avg_wait 8ms
- pool-ttl: active 3 | idle 1 | waiting 0 | exhaustion 0 | max 10 | avg_wait 5ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 87.0% | Bandwidth: 2.3 Gbps | Origin requests: 25000

### Alerts
- [SEVERE] TSIG failure on hostname: 2 AXFRs failed due to expired key metadata
- [WARNING] SOA serial mismatch on hostname: 3 zones
- [INFO] Propagation delay: average 88s | p95: 235s
- [INFO] Stale answer percentage: 0.8%
- [SEVERE] Zone transfer failures: 2 TSIG failures
- [WARNING] TTL rollback occurred in 1 zone
- [INFO] DNS query peak QPS: 64000
- [INFO] DNS query average QPS: 25000
- [WARNING] DNSSEC bogus validation events: 3
- [INFO] Propagation to 36 cloud edge sites completed in average 88s
- [WARNING] TTL changes: 72 records across 9 zones; min TTL 180s, max 43200s, median 1800s
- [INFO] Change requests: 8; applied: 7; failed: 1; mean apply time 29 min

### Deployments & Changes
- Rotated DKIM selectors across 9 zones; propagation p95 rose, stale answers increased to 0.8%
- Resolved pipeline apply failure due to conflicting record ownership; consolidated zone definition and reapplied
- Regenerated TSIG keys after failures; updated in secret store
- Introduced per-zone merge queue to serialize SOA serial updates after mismatches

### Events
- Large update: rotated DKIM selectors across 9 zones; propagation p95 rose and stale answers increased to 0.8% during window
- One pipeline apply failed due to conflicting record ownership between two IaC modules; resolved by consolidating zone definition and reapplying
- TSIG failures seen on two AXFRs; traced to expired TSIG key validity metadata in secret store; regenerated key material and updated both ends
- SOA serial mismatches on 3 zones after parallel commits; introduced per-zone merge queue requirement to serialize changes

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: W. Park. 3 pages. 9 tickets. Status: Elevated during DKIM rotation; stabilized after key regen and IaC ownership fix
